About the Company: Insecticides (India) Limited engages in the formulation, manufacture, and sale of pesticides in India. It offers formulated pesticides consisting of pesticides, herbicides, fungicides and plant growth regulators, and technical pesticides to protect paddy, cotton, wheat, sugarcane, vegetables, mustard, and groundnut crops. The company also offers urban pest products, such as LETHAL woodcare, LETHAL mosquito coils, and LETHAL vaporizer products, as well as LETHAL line of products for cockroaches, ants etc..The company also engagged in the business of Formulations, Technical (a.i).
